thread.title: Tottenham almost signed Sadio Mane instead of Liverpool | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Tottenham almost signed Sadio Mane instead of Liverpool | Daily Mail Online

author: Sam Morshead For Mailonline
title: Tottenham almost signed Sadio Mane instead of Liverpool | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Tottenham's top earners Harry Kane and Hugo Lloris rake in Â£100,000 per week at White Hart Lane, while Liverpool are willing to pay their biggest star, Philippe Coutinho, 50 per cent more. Mane will come face to face with the club for whom he so nearly signed when Spurs visit Anfield on Saturday evening. The two teams are in very different form, with Liverpool having failed to win a Premier League match in 2017 and Tottenham rapidly becoming Chelsea's closest rivals in the title race. Pochettino's men currently sit second, nine points behind the Blues, having not lost in the top flight since December 11. A report states the Senegalese almost signed for Spurs before picking Liverpool in the summer RELATED ARTICLES
